QuestData.Title: When Only Ash Remains
QuestData.Description:
Is this really what becomes of the exiled? Are they left here to burn to ash?
How could the Master allow such a thing? It is cruel. Heartless, even.
No venthyr would want to continue on like this.
You must end their suffering.
QuestData.RewardText: I thought I knew our sire, but anyone who would do this to his subjects is not worth following.
